title: Practical Application of Deep Learning-Based Speech Enhancement Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of signal processing, understanding of deep learning model architectures, and Python programming proficiency
context.additional_context: A course strengthening practitioners' ability to design and optimize lightweight deep learning models for real-world noise reduction challenges

learning_goals: Perform spectrogram analysis and visualization of voice signals using STFT transformation
Understand the LMResUnet++ model architecture and implement multi-scale information processing mechanisms
Design a hyperparameter optimization process applying the Aquila Black Widow Optimization (ABWO) algorithm
Write a comparative analysis report on voice quality evaluation based on PESQ metrics
Develop a lightweight voice enhancement system prototype deployable on personal devices
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
